title: Presentation of the Trailer of a Film "Scénario"
original_title: Exposé du film annonce du film “Scénario”
overview: In October 2021, Jean-Luc Godard presented his idea for Scénario, a 6 chapter feature film combining still and moving images, halfway between reading and seeing.
synopsis: In October 2021, Jean-Luc Godard presented his idea for Scénario, a 6 chapter feature film combining still and moving images, halfway between reading and seeing.
